long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best email capture & screenshot tool to record marketing emails.
Want to share email designs and templates to inspire and teach your marketing teams?
It's finally possible with Email Screenshot by JRNY.

Who is this for:
- Email Marketers
- Email Marketing Agencies
- Creative Teams
- DTC Brand Owners
- Klaviyo experts

Main features:
📋 1 click Copy to clipboard 📋
Capture email and perfectly copy to clipboard as an image you can paste it in order to share it over Slack, email, docs or wherever.

💾 1 click Save as PNG/PDF 💾
Save a perfect cropped file of the email to file and create your own inspiration library.

🏆 Competitor Research 🏆
Keep track of the campaigns your competitors are running, and stay on top of your marketing strategy.

Coming soon:
